languages.text: "Во имя процветания нашего и торжества правосудия сии грешники, изменники и казнокрады да будут преданы строгой казни! Сообщайте о всяком известном вам грешнике и славьте Вольного Торговца, принесшего нам очищение от паразитов и тварей хищных!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Как знак свой решительности Вольный торговец приказал устроить массоые казни, чтобы враги династии знали что им не будем пощады!

languages.text: "In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these profaners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any transgressor you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"
languages.original_text: "Во имя процветания нашего и торжества правосудия сии грешники, изменники и казнокрады да будут преданы строгой казни! Сообщайте о всяком известном вам грешнике и славьте Вольного Торговца, принесшего нам очищение от паразитов и тварей хищных!"

traits.locale_text: "In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these sinners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any sinner you know! Praise the Rogue Trader who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

"In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these sinners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any sinner you know! Praise the Rogue Trader who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

"In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these sinners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any sinner you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

"In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these sinners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any sinner you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

"In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these profaners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any transgressor you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

languages.text: “以繁荣与正义之名，这群罪人、叛徒与贪污犯将面临严厉惩处！如果你知道任何人犯了罪，要立刻通知当局！赞美行商浪人，是{mf|他|她}消灭了盘踞在我们家中的寄生虫与掠食者！”
languages.original_text: "In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these profaners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any transgressor you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

traits.locale_text: “以繁荣与正义之名，这群罪人、叛徒与贪污犯将面临严厉惩处！如果你知道任何人犯了罪，要立刻通知当局！赞美行商浪人，是{mf|他|她}消灭了盘踞在我们家中的寄生虫与掠食者！”

languages.text: «Por el bien de nuestra prosperidad y para que se haga justicia, ¡estos profanadores, traidores y malversadores sufrirán una ejecución inmediata! ¡Informen a las autoridades de cualquier transgresor al que conozcan! ¡Gloria a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, que expulsa a los parásitos y depredadores de nuestros hogares!».
languages.original_text: "In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these profaners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any transgressor you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

traits.locale_text: «Por el bien de nuestra prosperidad y para que se haga justicia, ¡estos pecadores, traidores y malversadores sufrirán una ejecución inmediata! ¡Informen a las autoridades de cualquier pecador al que conozcan! ¡Gloria a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, que expulsa a los parásitos y depredadores de nuestros hogares!».

languages.text: 「我々の繁栄と正義の勝利の名において、冒涜者、裏切り者、横領者には厳格な処刑が待っているだろう！違反者をご存じなら当局にご一報ください！我々の家から寄生虫やプレデターを一掃する自由開拓者を讃えよ！」
languages.original_text: "In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these profaners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any transgressor you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

traits.locale_text: 「我々の繁栄と正義の勝利の名において、罪人、裏切り者、横領者には厳格な処刑が待っているだろう！罪人をご存じなら当局にご一報ください！我々の家から寄生虫やプレデターを一掃する自由開拓者を讃えよ！」

languages.text: "Im Namen unseres Wohlstands und des Triumphs der Gerechtigkeit werden diese Sünder, Verräter und Veruntreuer ihrer unerbittlichen Hinrichtung nicht entgehen! Meldet den Behörden alle Gesetzesbrecher, die Ihr kennt! Gepriesen sei {mf|der Freihändler, der|die Freihändlerin, die} unser Zuhause von Parasiten und Raubtieren säubert!"
languages.original_text: "In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these profaners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any transgressor you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

traits.locale_text: "Im Namen unseres Wohlstands und des Triumphs der Gerechtigkeit werden diese Sünder, Verräter und Veruntreuer ihrer unerbittlichen Hinrichtung nicht entgehen! Meldet den Behörden alle Sünder, die Ihr kennt! Gepriesen sei {mf|der Freihändler, der|die Freihändlerin, die} unser Zuhause von Parasiten und Raubtieren säubert!"

languages.text: « Au nom de notre prospérité et pour le triomphe de la justice, ces profanateurs, ces traîtres et ces escrocs subiront la lourde peine qu'ils méritent ! Dénoncez tous les criminels que vous connaissez aux autorités ! Louez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, qui chasse les parasites et les prédateurs hors de nos foyers ! »
languages.original_text: "In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these profaners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any transgressor you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

traits.locale_text: « Au nom de notre prospérité et pour le triomphe de la justice, ces pécheurs, ces traîtres et ces escrocs subiront la lourde peine qu'ils méritent ! Dénoncez tous les pécheurs que vous connaissez aux autorités ! Louez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, qui chasse les parasites et les prédateurs hors de nos foyers ! »

languages.text: "Refahımız ve adaletin sağlanması adına bu kâfirler, hainler ve zimmetçiler; hiçbir müsamaha gösterilmeden idam edilecektir! Tanıdığınız günahkârları yetkililere bildirin! Evlerimizi parazitlerden ve yırtıcılardan arındıran Hür Tacir'e şükürler olsun!"
languages.original_text: "In the name of our prosperity and the triumph of justice, these profaners, traitors, and embezzlers shall face their stern execution! Inform the authorities of any transgressor you know! Praise the Rogue Trader, who cleanses our homes of parasites and predators!"

traits.locale_text: "Refahımız ve adaletin sağlanması adına bu kâfirler, hainler ve zimmetçiler; hiçbir müsamaha gösterilmeden idam edilecektir! Tanıdığınız günahkârları yetkililere bildirin! Evlerimizi parazitlerden ve yırtıcılardan arındıran Hür Tacir'e şükürler olsun!"
